option.name: TOOL_WINDOW_CONFIGURED_FILTER
option.value: Show only selected application

list.name: Default
list.comment:
Update 2.4.2
-Force close on app-start on some devices fixed -Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)

option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary: -Device name is now customizable -DarkUI temporally removed

Update 2.4
-Device name is now customizable -DarkUI temporally removed -UI optimized
-Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)
-Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices
-Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Force close on appstart on some devices fixed

Update 2.4.2
-Force close on app-start on some devices fixed -Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)

MESSAGE.value: -Device name is now customizable -DarkUI temporally removed

Update 2.4
-Device name is now customizable -DarkUI temporally removed -UI optimized
-Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)
-Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices
-Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Force close on appstart on some devices fixed

Update 2.4.2
-Force close on app-start on some devices fixed -Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Update 2.4.2
-Force close on app-start on some devices fixed -Error on loading Screenshots fixed on low memory devices -Add files to Flash Queue (in Recovery-Script-Manager) fixed for Android 7.1.1 devices (start directory changed to internal memory instead of root)
